text: 4.16 Kol 2.19 chɨn wak ñɨn kɨd tob kɨd ne okok mɨdobun. Ne chɨnop gek, chɨn keke mɨdupsek nop chɨgɨl, bɨ kɨdɨl tek jɨmñɨl mubwak nokom mɨdobun. Pen ne chɨnop gek, chɨn penpen chɨgɨl penpen mapen lɨl gobun. Anɨgɨl mɨdɨl, wog chɨnop keke aglup tek gon amek nɨm, mɨdupsek gos sek mɨdɨl kɨles gɨl jak tep gɨl mɨdɨl, Klays mubwak ne awl gɨl kɨles gɨnɨgab.
